description: This is a Java source file defining a REST controller for authentication endpoints, including user registration, login, current user retrieval, and initiating Google OAuth2 login in a Spring Boot application.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: REST controller handling authentication-related endpoints such as user registration, login, retrieving current user info, and initiating Google OAuth2 login.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration by receiving a RegisterRequest, calling authService.register, and returning an AuthResponse with HTTP status 201.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user login by receiving a LoginRequest, calling authService.login, and returning an AuthResponse with HTTP status 200.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves information about the currently authenticated user by calling authService.getCurrentUser and returning a UserProfileResponse.

methods.name: initiateGoogleLogin
methods.description: Provides an endpoint to start Google OAuth2 login flow, returning a redirect message.
